channel.title: Players Command

item.title: Players Command
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I am using a Battlescape source.

My players command brings up the interface with the player’s names. I attempted to add the combat level next to it, but it showed the person who did ::players combat level for everyone instead of everyone’s individual combat level.

Here is my void:

public void playersOnline() { ClearFrame8134(); client p = Server.s.playerHandler.clients[i]; changeText126("@dre@Players Online", 8144); int lineId = 8148; for (int i = 0; i < Server.s.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) { if (Server.s.playerHandler.playersCurrentlyOn[i] != null && !Server.s.playerHandler.playersCurrentlyOn[i].equals("")) { changeText126("@dbl@" + Server.s.playerHandler.playersCurrentlyOn[i]+" (Level-"+combatLevel+")", lineId); lineId++; } } } showInterface(8134); }

Read full topic
